definitions.definition: One of the tiny pores in the epidermis of a leaf or stem through which gases and water vapor pass .
A small opening in a membrane ; a surgically constructed opening, especially one in the abdominal wall that permits the passage of waste after a colostomy or ileostomy .
A mouthlike opening, such as the oral cavity of a nematode .

main_definition: ( botany ) One of the tiny pores in the epidermis of a leaf or stem through which gases and water vapor pass .
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) A small opening in a membrane ; a surgically constructed opening, especially one in the abdominal wall that permits the passage of waste after a colostomy or ileostomy .
( zoology ) A mouthlike opening, such as the oral cavity of a nematode .
